name: Islanded
summary:
Islanded is a Survival Nature Sandbox game, based in the interaction with the nature to survive.Use animals to explore, find food and fight while searching for resources to build in a huge open world with total freedom.

Interact with the nature
In a hostile environment nature and animals can be your enemy or your only ally.Get abilities to control animals in the world to fly, run or swim. Explore unknown terrain without risk.

Open World, Open possibilities
Travel across the Islands to find the best place to establish your settlement.Build in different locations and transport resources with basic engineering. Nature is not always the answer.
